column3: A human corpse, another one. Another strange death, his chest is ripped

column1: open and blood covers his body. There was a time when that work uniform didn't

column3: The left lapel still holds a golden pin, circular with several dark blue

column1: hexagons linked by small circles forming another hexagon

column3: I don't know the justice of his death, or what a scientist is doing in

column1: this facility, but I'm sure the death was not a pleasant one.
Perhaps Caius knows more about this.
